content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/clinlab-life-science-staffing-boston-recruiting.jpg” transparent_background=”off” background_color=”#ffffff” allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header admin_label=”Fullwidth Header” title=”ClinLab Life Sciences Staffing” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”left” subhead=”Scientific Recruiting & Employment Agency ~ Boston, Nashua, Chapel Hill” /][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left”]

Employers:

Are you struggling to find a firm that specializes in the pharmaceutical & biotech fields?

The best talent is out there. You just need to draw it to your business before your competitors beat you to it.

Scientific Recruitment >>

Scientific Professionals:

Do you want to advance your career at a leading life sciences organization?

Partner with a team of industry experts who focus on pharmaceutical and biotech staffing.

Life Science Careers >>

ClinLab Staffing launched in 2003 to provide recruitment and career solutions within pharmaceutical, biotech, and med-device companies, CROs and MROs, hospitals and medical schools. Let us help advance your goals, as you concentrate on science and we concentrate on talent development and success.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left”]

LEARN MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
ClinLab Staffing - Scientific Recruiting & Employment Agency

Employers: Are you struggling to find a firm that specializes in the pharmaceutical & biotech fields?

The best talent is out there. You just need to draw it to your business before your competitors beat you to it.

Scientific Recruitment >>

Scientific Professionals: Do you want to advance your career at a leading life sciences organization?

Partner with a team of industry experts who focus on pharmaceutical and biotech staffing.

Life Science Careers >>

A&A Search created ClinLab Staffing in 2003 to provide recruitment and career solutions within pharmaceutical, biotech, and med-device companies, CROs and MROs, hospitals and medical schools. Let us help advance your goals, as you concentrate on science and we concentrate on talent development and success.
